name: dash
description: Dash library for JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystem (Wallet, DAPI, Primitives, BLS, ...)

scripts.start:dev: nodemon --exec 'npm run build:dev && npm run test:ts'
scripts.check-package: npm run check-package:name && npm run check-package:version
scripts.check-package:name: test $(jq -r .name package.json) = $(jq -r .name package-lock.json)
scripts.test: npm run test:ts && npm run build:prod && npm run test:js
scripts.build:doc: typedoc --exclude '**/*+(index|.spec|.e2e).ts' --includes docs/ --out tdoc src/ --name 'Dash JavaScript SDK' --includeVersion --theme pages-plugin
scripts.build:doc2: typedoc --exclude '**/*+(index|.spec|.e2e).ts' --includes docs/ --out tdoc src/ --name 'Dash JavaScript SDK' --includeVersion --includeDeclarations --excludeExternals
